actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that decisions by the Civil Service Commission on applications for civil service retirement benefits should be made within 21 days.

summary.text: Declares that decisions by the Civil Service Commission on applications for civil service retirement benefits should be made within 21 days.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that decisions by the Civil Service Commission on applications for civil service retirement benefits should be made within 21 days.
